stories.text:
Is HN intentionally downplaying the imporance of Russian attack on Ukraine?

I really don't understand. This conflict is unprecedented and could possibly lead to WW3. What is top3 on HN right now:

* Indian chess sensation * Nuclear-fusion reactor * NewPipe

Submission with Reuters article on Russian attack (https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=30450336) is #32. It's insane.
stories.title: Ask HN: Why nobody cares about Ukraine?
Data pipeline with Rust, and integrated as a FFI RPC layer with Go/Py consumers

stories.text:
There is no need to reiterate the news, but I was looking for some discussion on Hacker News. Therefore I'm going to ask, what is the atmosphere like, and wish strength to anybody directly affected by war.

Here in Estonia, a country bordering Russia, there just so happens to be independence day, and some people are feeling quite spooked, but of course, there is no war anywhere near here.
stories.title: Ask HN: Anybody in Ukraine or Russia?
